import React, { useRef } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; function AddUser() { let name = useRef(); let amount = useRef(); const addEntry = () =>{ let body={ "name":name.current.value, "amount": amount.current.value } axios.post(`http://localhost:3000/add_account`,body).then(res=>{ if(res.status == 200){ return ( Bootstrap 11 mins ago Hello, world! This is a toast message. ) console.log() } console.log("res",res)}).catch(err=>console.log("err",err)); } return (
नाव
रोख ऍडव्हान्स
) } export default AddUser
